| Resource    | List                                                |
|-------------|-----------------------------------------------------|
| agent:id    | 000,001,002,003,004,005,006,007,008,009,010,011,012 |


| Actions        | Resources | Allow                               | Deny            |
|----------------|-----------|-------------------------------------|-----------------|
| rootcheck:read | agent:id  | 002,004,006,007,008,009,010,011,012 | 000,001,003,005 |
| rootcheck:run  | agent:id  | 002,004,006,007,008,009,010,011,012 | 000,001,003,005 |
